news.title: Version 12 Stable Release
news.caption: Version 12 Stable has now been released! Check out our release notes for everything you need to know.

news.title: 2024 Year in Review
news.caption: Join us in a look back at what we accomplished since our last anniversary celebration, and look ahead towards the exciting things we plan for during the coming year. This annual article is a great way to get some insight into what we do as a company and how we do it.

news.title: Overview Video
news.caption: Watch a comprehensive video overview which summarizes the features of Foundry Virtual Tabletop.

featuredContent.title: Last Chance to Back Ember
featuredContent.caption: Ember is a roleplaying campaign and setting with groundbreaking digital features that are sure to transform your game. It includes open exploration, tactical gameplay, interactive environments, and theatrical narrative. Check out our most ambitious project yet on Kickstarter!
